text: Tridrepana crocea is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by John Henry Leech in 1889. It is found in China (Zhejiang, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Fujian, Guangxi, Sichuan, Yunnan), Japan and Korea. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1889 Category:Drepaninae
title: Tridrepana crocea
